summary.Title: Customer Relations Developer
summary.Presentation: Are you passionate about building strong customer relationships and delivering exceptional service? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment? Are you looking for long term opportunities f

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about building strong customer relationships and delivering exceptional service? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment? Are you looking for long term opportunities for Your carrier? If yes, then we want YOU to join our team at Bixter as a Customer Relations Developer in German department!

What You’ll Do:
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and new customers, ensuring their needs are met with excellence.
  • Identify opportunities to expand our customer base and develop tailored solutions.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for customer inquiries, delivering timely and effective responses.
  • Collaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless communication and execution of customer requirements.
  • Analyze customer feedback to drive continuous improvement in our services.
What We’re Looking For:
  • Language Proficiency: Fluency in German and English is essential.
  • Customer-Focused Mindset: A genuine passion for understanding and meeting customer needs.
  • Relationship Builder: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to develop long-lasting partnerships.
  • Problem Solver: Proactive approach to resolving customer issues and optimizing processes.
  • Experience: Previous experience in customer relations, sales, or business development is a plus, but not a requirement.
Why Join Bixter?
  • Innovative Culture: Be part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to making a positive impact.
  • Growth Opportunities: Advance your career in a supportive and dynamic environment.
  • Global Perspective: Work with diverse teams and clients from around the world.
  • Work-life balance: Important for us that you can balance your work with your family life.
How to Apply:

Please submit your application by sending an email to nj@bixter.com.

Become a vital part of Bixter’s mission and deliver exceptional customer experiences and drive growth. Let’s grow together!
